name: create_aura_blueprint_draft
description: Use this tool to generate a Product Requirements Document (PRD) from a Salesforce Aura component. The PRD outlines the component's structure, functionality, and requirements for migrating or converting it into a Lightning Web Component (LWC), as part of the Aura to LWC migration workflow orchestrator.

files.description: Component files as key-value pairs where key is filename and value is file content. Can be passed as an object or JSON string.
